# Class References

Source code locations and documentation URLs for further investigation.

| Class | Description | Inherits | Source | Documentation |
|-------|-------------|----------|--------|---------------|
| `ui.chat_message` | Chat-style message bubble | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/chat_message.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/chat_message) |
| `ui.element` | Generic HTML element | — | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/element.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/element) |
| `ui.html` | Raw HTML content | ContentElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/html.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/html) |
| `ui.label` | Display text | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/label.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/label) |
| `ui.link` | Hyperlink element | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/link.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/link) |
| `ui.link_target` | Anchor target for navigation | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/link.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/link_target) |
| `ui.markdown` | Render Markdown content | ContentElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/markdown.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/markdown) |
| `ui.mermaid` | Render Mermaid diagrams | ContentElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/mermaid/mermaid.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/mermaid) |
| `ui.restructured_text` | Render reStructuredText | ContentElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/restructured_text.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/restructured_text) |
